name: Ichiran Ramen

images.alt: Ichiran ramen with extra sides, including meet, egg, and black fungus
Ichiran ramen with a glass of water nearby

description: A bowl of Ichiran Tonkotsu ramen: creamy pork-bone broth, thin noodles, sliced chashu pork, scallions, and a dollop of spicy red sauce. Spice level is adjustable; can add a soft-boiled egg or extra toppings. Import from Japan

name: Chongqing Chicken Pot

images.alt: Hong Kong-style Chongqing chicken pot with braised chicken chunks and onions simmering in a spicy

description: Hong Kong-style Chongqing chicken pot: tender chicken pieces and onions braised with dried chilis and Sichuan peppercorns in a bold, numbing-spicy sauce, served sizzling in a black claypot.

name: Cart Noodles

images.alt: Hong Kong-style cart noodles bowl with enoki mushrooms, sausage, greens, and fried garlic in clear broth

description: Hong Kong-style cart noodles: thin noodles hidden beneath enoki mushrooms, sausage, greens, and crispy fried garlic in a light savory broth.

name: Hong Kong-Style Milk Tea

images.alt: Tall glass of iced Hong Kong-style milk tea with ice cubes

description: Chilled Hong Kong-style milk tea: strong black tea blended with creamy milk, poured over ice in a tall glass with a purple straw for a refreshing sip.

name: Coconut milk 椰汁大王

images.alt: Iced coconut milk with tapioca pearls in a clear cup with a purple straw.

description: A Hong Kong-style iced coconut milk drink with tapioca pearls in a clear cup.

name: Satay Beef Noodle Soup

images.alt: Bowl of satay beef noodles with sliced beef in broth

description: Satay beef noodle soup featuring tender beef slices and springy noodles in a savory, peanut-spiced broth. Served in a modern square bowl with a spoon and chopsticks.

name: Corn Rice

images.alt: Bowl of rice topped with creamy corn and diced meat

description: Steamed rice topped with a rich, slightly sweet creamy corn mixture and tender diced meat. Served in a black bowl as a comforting side or light meal.

name: Fish and Pork Siu Mai

images.alt: Four fish and pork siu mai dumplings topped with orange roe in a bamboo steamer.

description: Hong Kong-style siu mai filled with minced fish and pork, seasoned lightly and topped with a touch of roe. Steamed until tender and juicy, often served with a soy-based dipping sauce.

name: Hong Kong-style French Toast

images.alt: Thick Hong Kong-style French toast with butter and syrup, served with strawberries.

description: Deep-fried sandwich toast stuffed with condensed milk and peanut butter, golden and crispy on the outside. Topped with a pat of butter and drizzled syrup, served with fresh strawberries and extra syrup on the side in a cozy café setting.

name: Bubble Waffle

images.alt: Golden egg waffle in a paper cone with condensed milk on the side.

description: Crispy-on-the-outside, soft-on-the-inside Hong Kong-style egg waffle served in a paper cone, dusted with powdered sugar. A side of condensed milk adds sweetness, with a warm street market blur in the background.

name: Bolo Yau

images.alt: Pineapple bun with a slice of butter on a plate, tea in the background.

description: Golden Hong Kong-style pineapple bun topped with a melting pat of butter, served on a white plate.
